snippet.title: Alleged organiser of Toowoomba shooting, charged
snippet.content: A woman has been charged with attempted murder, after a man was shot in the stomach and knee in Toowoomba almost two weeks ago. Police will allege the woman, who was known to the victim, was responsible for .Photo: Melody Labinsky It will be alleged just after 1am, a 20-year-old local man was speaking with two men outside the residence before being shot and taken to hospital with serious but non-life threatening injuries. A 26-year-old Glenvale woman has been charged with attempted murder and was due to appear in Toowoomba Magistrates Court on Tuesday.Photo: Nine News / Twitter A 23-year-old Scarborough man was charged soon after the alleged incident with attempted murder, weapon and ammunition possession, stealing and various driving offences. He was remanded in custody to reappear in Toowoomba Magistrates Court on September 14. Toowoomba detectives continue to search for the second man believed to be involved in the alleged attack.
